Description: Activity (demand and emission) associated with emissions from domestic and industrial liquid and solid waste production, storage, and treatment

Activity (demand and emission) associated with energy generation and consumption, including:
  • stationary emissions in commercial, municipal, and residential buildings;
  • electricity generation;
  • industrial energy use; and
  • transportation.
Activity (demand and emission) associated with industrial processes and product use.
Socioeconomic and demographic activity affecting all sectors; primary driver of emissions and energy demands.
